attributes.action: Help STOP Genocide of Rohingya Muslims in Myanmar (Burma)
attributes.additional_details:
What Genocide Agenda reveals?
• Evidence that Myanmar government agents have been involved in triggering anti-Muslim riots
• A confidential document warning of "nationwide communal riots" was deliberately sent to local townships to incite anti-Muslim fears
• A report by Yale Law School concludes there is "strong evidence" genocide is taking place in Myanmar
• A report by the International State Crime Initiative at London University, confirms that genocide is taking place. 

Source: Al Jazeera
attributes.background: The Rohingya muslims from south west region of Myanmar (Burma) are being victimized, massacred, raped, murdered, persecuted and pushed out of their own hearths and homes having no Burmese statehood for centuries. The worst mass slaughter of these innocent people is being occurred nowadays.
